name: Figma Motion 基础知识
description:
Motion 是一个动画工具，可以帮助你把你的设计带入生活。想在用户界面中做一些互动，添加一些令人惊叹的效果，或者为手机游戏中的一些角色制作动画？试试 Motion 吧！


插件安装地址：

https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/889777319208467032/Motion?fuid=460022585706902284


支持

Twitter https://twitter.com/motionplugin

Facebook https://www.facebook.com/groups/motionplugin


2022.05.18 已更新汉化，随冲


————

Motion is an animation tool which helps you to bring your design to life. Want to make some interactions in UI, add some stunning effects or animate some character for a mobile game? Try Motion :)


Install

https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/889777319208467032/Motion?fuid=460022585706902284
